id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [Status LED](https://esphome.io/components/status_led.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The GPIO pin to operate the status LED on.

*See also: [Status LED](https://esphome.io/components/status_led.html#configuration-variables)*

output.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the binary [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for this light.

*See also: [Status LED Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/status_led.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The GPIO pin to operate the LED on.

*See also: [Status LED Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/status_led.html#configuration-variables)*
